meaning: labor, thank for, reward for, toil, trouble

onyomiExamples.meaning: labor, labour, toil, trouble, pains, work, effort, striving
labor union, labour union, trade union

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to work, to labor, to labour, to put to work, to make (someone) work
to pity, to sympathize with, to sympathise with, to treat with sympathy, to console, to be kind to, to appreciate, to tend to (e.g. an injury), to care for, to nurse, to soothe
to show appreciation for (efforts, esp. by someone of equal or lower status), to thank for, to reward for
